name: Eliott's Odyssey Pico 8
description:
Elliott’s odyssey  

There it is ! Welcome to my game jam project « Elliott’s odyssey ». 

Help Elliott to escape from the fourteen levels of the dungeon.

 

Be careful, some ambush will appear during the trip !  

Made in Pico 8 for the may 2018 Pre-Indie Game Jam  

To unlock the level door, activate switchs in the right order.

    Control

Move : arrow <>

Jump = arrow UP

Turn on button : keyboard « C »

   

Could you speedrun the game with the better time ?

 

Post your best time-screen.

 

Thx for playing !

Follow me on : 

https://www.facebook.com/PetitrudyHRS/
